title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-6.2 - Distribution of bottled or bulk water
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-6.2 - Distribution of bottled or bulk water

State Regulations

No person shall sell, offer for sale or deliver bottled or bulk water for human consumption, food preparation or culinary purposes unless certified by the commissioner in accordance with the requirements of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
